CHK_content_performance_content_exists.name: CHK_content_performance_content_exists
CHK_content_performance_content_exists.value: ("content_performance"."video_id" IS NOT NULL) OR ("content_performance"."stream_id" IS NOT NULL)

CHK_content_performance_retention.name: CHK_content_performance_retention
CHK_content_performance_retention.value: "content_performance"."retention_rate_25" >= 0 AND "content_performance"."retention_rate_50" >= 0 AND "content_performance"."retention_rate_75" >= 0 AND "content_performance"."retention_rate_100" >= 0 AND "content_performance"."retention_rate_25" <= 10000 AND "content_performance"."retention_rate_50" <= 10000 AND "content_performance"."retention_rate_75" <= 10000 AND "content_performance"."retention_rate_100" <= 10000

CHK_copyright_reports_content_exists.name: CHK_copyright_reports_content_exists
CHK_copyright_reports_content_exists.value: ("copyright_reports"."video_id" IS NOT NULL) OR ("copyright_reports"."stream_id" IS NOT NULL)

CHK_view_sessions_content_exists.name: CHK_view_sessions_content_exists
CHK_view_sessions_content_exists.value: ("view_sessions"."video_id" IS NOT NULL) OR ("view_sessions"."stream_id" IS NOT NULL)
